subject: Re: [junit] Junit's Importance
msgSnippet: ... The main advantage of using JUnit (or any other testing tool) is that you set a standard.  In an organization, each developer has his own way of testing
messageBody:
> Can someone tell me the real advantages of using Junit over the
> individual's own Unit testing of the Java Code written by him.


The main advantage of using JUnit (or any other testing tool) is that
you set a standard. In an organization, each developer has his own way
of testing things; if you're maintaining a code you haven't written, you
must first understand the tests that have been written before adding
yours. With JUnit, everyone shares the same framework to execute the tests.

The goal is not to write tests, but to write your application so keep
the tests simple.

-Vladimir

--
Vladimir Bossicard
